sections.heading: 15:11-16 through 15:11-20, inclusive, of the Revised Statutes are hereby repealed; provided, however, that such repeal shall not affect the continuance in office, position or employment of any person heretofore appointed pursuant to such sections
sections.text: 15:11-16 through 15:11-20, inclusive, of the Revised Statutes are hereby repealed; provided, however, that such repeal shall not affect the continuance in office, position or employment of any person heretofore appointed pursuant to such sections.
